text: Pedro Villagrán (1946 – 11 February 2022) was a Spanish politician. He was a member of the Spanish Socialist Workers' Party. He was a Senator for the Province of Málaga between 2004 and 2008. Villagrán died on 11 February 2022, at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Spanish politicians
title: Pedro Villagrán
